pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw:
The message appeared to be coming after the analysis routines had run on the shot.

I just went away from the lab for a few minutes without any experiments running, and returned to a wall of red text. It appears as though BLACS is repeatedly submitting the last file to lyse every ~10-15 seconds.
content.html:
The message appeared to be coming after the analysis routines had run on the shot.

I just went away from the lab for a few minutes without any experiments running, and returned to a wall of red text. It appears as though BLACS is repeatedly submitting the last file to lyse every ~10-15 seconds.
